alert.note: Alert for Ionia; Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 10:16PM EDT until July 23 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ionia County in south central Michigan... Montcalm County in central Michigan... * Until 1115 PM EDT. * At 1016 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Howard City to 6 miles southeast of Rockford to near Caledonia, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ionia... Greenville... Belding... Portland... Stanton... Lake Odessa... Howard City... Saranac... Edmore... Carson City... Lakeview... Orleans... Crystal... Sidney... Sebewa... Lyons... Sheridan... Muir... Mulliken... Pewamo... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
